verbose_text: We can concisely conclude that preparations with alphaGC are able to favor the Th1 development from the Th precursor via the IFN-gamma secretion, which not only exhibited the different cytokine release pattern, but also stimulated the antitumor cellular immunity mediated by CTL.
evidence: IFN-gamma secretion, which not only exhibited the different cytokine release pattern, but also stimulated the antitumor cellular immunity
